no_more_50_words: Curiosity is satisfied with information, and news provides information, and a newcomer usually carries with them some news.
100_to_150_words: The ladies at the salon had plenty of curiosity, anytime someone came in they wanted to hear news. The salon was a place of gossip and an exchange of stories. It was a place where a person could hear about the latest news from the town, or from the world. The ladies were always eager to hear about the latest trends, who was in town, and what was going on. They were also interested in hearing about different people's lives and experiences. They were also interested in hearing about the latest fashion, and what was popular among the locals. The ladies wanted to stay up to date on all the latest news and gossip so they could be the first to know. They also wanted to be able to discuss the news and gossip with their customers, and make sure they were well informed.
